price: 35 Là, ils n’entendront ni futilités, ni propos mensongers.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
